name: Elixir
description: Restores one usage of the character's class-specific special ability.

name: Bomb
description: Inflicts 30HP of damage on the enemy. Cannot be used outside of battle.

name: Auto-Revive
description: Automatically revives the character with full HP on the event of the character's death in battle.

name: Stimulant
description: Boosts the character's attack power for 2 turns. Increased damage is inflicted in on the enemy with each attack for the duration of the effect. Cannot be used outside of battle.

name: Tonic
description: Boosts the character's defense stat for the next enemy attack, meaning that the character takes less damage for the duration of the effect. Cannot be used outside of battle.

name: Knife
description: Inflicts 10HP of damage on the enemy. Cannot be used outside of battle.
